Description: Enabling Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies allows Exchange Online and SharePoint Online content to be scanned for specific types of data like social security numbers, credit card numbers, or passwords.
Remediation: Please Consult the Reference to create a new DLP Policy via PowerShell or use the M365 Admin Center: 1. Under Admin centers Select Compliance to open Microsoft 365 compliance center. > 2. Under Solutions select Data loss prevention then Policies. > 3. Click Create policy.
